outputs.output_descr:
The outputs expected from the Capacity Development for Nation Building of Curacao project include:
1. The Creation of a National Development Plan with sector based implementation plans developed through a participatory dialogue process.

2. The establishment of a national socio-economic database.

3. The strengthening of national capacities so as to assist the nation of Curacao in attaining Millienium Development Goals 1 (eradication of poverty and hunger) and 7 (ensuring environmental sustainability).

4. The development of a sector-wide aid coordination strategy which will be rolled out to support the needs of the nation.

project_descr: Capacity Development for Nation Building of Curacao project will assist the Government of Curacao in formulating a National Development Plan, develop national socio-economic database and assist the country in meeting Millennium Development Goals
project_title: Capacity Development for Nation Building of Curacao
